FlowRead is a lightweight reading assistant that adds a customizable visual guide to any webpage.
Whether you're reading long articles, scanning technical documents, or reviewing code, FlowRead helps you stay focused by highlighting the line you're reading. Its subtle yellow overlay acts like a digital ruler, reducing eye fatigue and improving reading flow.

Features include:

A draggable, resizable focus bar

Customizable colour, opacity, and height

Simple and clean interface with no tracking

Perfect for students, developers, people with dyslexia, and anyone who spends long hours reading online.
